summary:
Trump rally shooting live updates: Biden spoke with Trump, White House official says - The president was taken to the hospital and is 'fine,' a spokesperson said.

 Fitness guru Richard Simmons dead at 76 - 

 Dr. Ruth Westheimer, sex therapist and talk show host, dies at 96 - 

 Gypsy Rose Blanchard speaks out in 1st TV interview since announcing pregnancy -
